alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:03PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Rising Streams and Rivers Through Thursday... High water will occur on rivers and streams over the Seward Peninsula and in the Kobuk and and Noatak Valleys today through Thursday. Heavy rain fell last night and today from Nome to Selawik, and heavy rain is expected tonight over the Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. This will cause streams and small river to rise rapidly tonight and Wednesday over the Seward Peninsula and in the Kobuk and and Noatak Valleys. Water will make its way downstream into larger rivers on Thursday. No flooding is expected at this time, but people camping along rivers and boating on rivers should be alert for rising water and increased debris in the rivers.
